name: 互動式英語閱讀
comment: 進階英語課程，供非英語系同學選修
description: 訓練學生利用閱讀策略，經由閱讀過程中的討論，提昇學生英語閱讀能力，也藉由問答方式讓學生與文本、老師、及同學間產生互動，以深入探討文章內涵。
goals: 強化學生英語文聆聽、閱讀、口語、寫作的表達能力，協助獲取新知。
提昇學生英語文進階溝通能力及文學素養。
syllabus:
**Class Time:**        Thursdays, 10:20 a.m. - 12:10 p.m.

**Classroom:**        勤 301      

**Instructor:**         Dr. PiYu Chiang

**Office:**                CHENG 709        

**Email:**                 piyu.chiang.ntnu@gmail.com

**I. COURSE OVERVIEW**

The main purpose of this course is to expand students’ abilities to read, reflect and discuss various cultural and global topics. No textbook is required. All reading materials will come from reliable sources such as The New York Times. Students are expected to read prior to the class and participate in class discussions.

**II. GRADING**

          Attendance 20%

*   If you have to miss a class, please email me in advance.
*   If you miss the class for more than 3 times (unexcused), points will be deducted.

          In-Class Participation 25%

*   You will work in pairs and with your group. Be a responsible partner. Finish reading before class, and be prepared to share your ideas.
*   Class activities

          Group Presentation 25%

*   Group presentation: Present a food related issue/ report. 12-15 minutes
*   Class activities.

Reading Journals 20%

*   Typed/ Hand-written, double-spaced, hard copy, no more than 1 piece of paper.
*   Each journal should include:

a. Summary of one article (Pick “one” to write)

b. One discussion question and its answers (based on your group discussion)

c. Any other reading notes that you want to include in this theme (e.g. vocabulary, phrases, quotes, reflection…)

          Final Presentation 10%

*   Present a mind map or an infograph to illustrate what you have learned from this course.
*   2.5 minutes
